Metadata: Perspectives on U.S. policy toward the Law of the Sea: prelude to the final session of the Third U.N. Conference on the Law of the Sea
Perspectives on U.S. Policy Toward the Law of the Sea, Third United Nations Conference on the Law of the Sea, Berkeley, California, February 20, 1982.
The Law of the Sea Institute

This volume represents, in large part, the proceedings of a symposium sponsored by the Boalt Hall International Law Society, co-sponsored by the Earl Warren Legal Institute and the American Society of International Law, held at Boalt Hall School of Law, University of California at Berkeley, CA on February 20, 1982.
